div.div: On Tuesday, April 14th, the School Committee voted unanimously to cancel the April school vacation week (Tuesday, April 21 - Friday, April 24th) and to use these four days as school days. Read on...
Remote Learning Plan (RLP) information for families with secondary school students. Secondary RLP
Remote Learning Plan (RLP) information for families with elementary school students. Elementary RLP
Revised 2019-2020 School Year Calendar & 2020-2021 School Year Calendar Read on...
Meal pickup days are Monday, Wednesday and Friday from 10:00 AM to 12:00 PM at Hollis & Ross Elementary Schools. Grab and Go Meal Program Details
An update from Braintree Public School Superintendent Dr. Frank Hackett Read 3/27/20 Update
Updates regarding COVID-19 and Learning Resources for parents that can be used by families voluntarily. Information & Resources (Link)
Update for Students and Families Read 3/22/20 Update

The Braintree Public Schools administration and Health Services is in daily contact with the Town of Braintree Health Department and other organizations who are working to manage the response of school departments across the Commonwealth. Read More About COVID-19

In light of Governor Bakerâ€™s declaration of a State of Emergency the Braintree Public Schools will be canceling and/or postponing international and out-of-state student travel until further notice. Read Travel Notice

h4.a: ECE Preschool Lab Program Now Enrolling

div.div: Registration for the 2020-2021 ECE (Early Childhood Education) Preschool Laboratory Program at Braintree High School is officially open. Due to school closures we ask that you send your registration by email. Read on...
